attributes.action: Make car insurance for young drivers cheaper.
attributes.additional_details: when i spoke to the insurance company they said they cant make it cheaper i must have called by now 300 different company its mad i have no clue what to do. if we can get 10000 people to sign this that will be great,please send to your friends and any one who passes there test.
attributes.background:
Hi There,

My name is David and i started this petition for one reason as i am a 19 year old student who has passed his driving test spent £1000 pounds and now when i am looking for insurance there is nothing less then £2500 pounds.
